location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'GROUND REQUIRED FOR RE-FUELLING ARRANGEMENTS SHOWING POSITION TANK AND STORE AT BUSHIRE LINGAH JASK'

physicalDescription.extent: Material: Blue printDimensions on sheet 330 x 245mm

mods.abstract: A sketch of a plan showing the arrangement of the installation of the refuelling facilities at Gwadar landing ground. The sketch is part of a letter (f 20) sent by Charles Clark Mylles, Assistant Manager at the Anglo-Iranian Oil Company Limited, to the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire.
